class.name: sawyer_sim_controllers/SawyerPositionController
class.description: The SawyerPositionController tracks position commands for the entire Sawyer arm. It expects a SharedJointInterface (EffortJointInterface) type of hardware interface.

class.name: sawyer_sim_controllers/SawyerVelocityController
class.description: The SawyerPositionController tracks velocity commands for the entire Sawyer arm. It expects a SharedJointInterface (EffortJointInterface) type of hardware interface.

class.name: sawyer_sim_controllers/SawyerEffortController
class.description: The SawyerPositionController tracks effort commands for the entire Sawyer arm. It expects a SharedJointInterface (EffortJointInterface) type of hardware interface.

class.name: sawyer_sim_controllers/SawyerGravityController
class.description: The SawyerGravityController adds an effort component to compensate for gravity. It expects a SharedJointInterface (EffortJointInterface) type of hardware interface.
